resources.string: You\'ll lose the cart items if you go back. Do you want to continue?
Do you want to continue placing the order?
Press back again to close the application

string.name: terms_and_condition
string.p:
1)Please register for home quarantine on the App only at location where you would be undergoing Isolation. Your current location at the time which you would be registering yourself for home quarantine on the App would be monitored, so please register yourself only where you are supposed to Quarantine. (Eg: If you're told to quarantine at home, open the app and register for Quarantine on the app only when you are at your house rather than any other location)
2)This is to agree that you\'ll be monitored my the govt. through the app for home quarantine, and if you violate the quarantine, you\'ll be punished by the local governing body.
3)You are supposed to click a picture and send it every 30 minutes from 9AM to 9PM.
4)Always keep your location on at all times, failing to do so will be considered as an act of violation and the local governing authorities can come to inspect you if they find out any default change from your location.
5)Any False registrations of home quarantine will be considered a Criminal act.
